description:
fil-miner-info.safematrix.io is a lightweight monitoring and management platform designed for Filecoin Storage Providers (SPs).
It provides a transparent, user-friendly dashboard for tracking miner node status, daily sealing progress, and deal operations.
By visualizing real-time node data, the tool helps SPs maintain stability, detect anomalies, and optimize operational performance.
additional_impact:
Established a community-driven reporting system for SP performance tracking.
Acts as an early warning infrastructure for network anomalies and regional failures.
Serves as a reference model for lightweight, open-source monitoring within the Filecoin tooling ecosystem.
end_user: SPs— gain monitoring and analytics for node operations； Ecosystem developers — integrate its APIs for reporting, auditing, and automation dashboards.
testimonials: Ecosystem teams praise its clear API integration and contribution to network transparency.
how_many_dependents: We are more open to SPs' maintaince
